name: Roseline X
description:
Roseline X follows the Remake theme by referencing Rockman X/Megaman X through an interactive book interface.
Made using Twine - my first time using the tool - it includes choices, pixelart images and animations to portray the events in the story.
I label this as  prototype as it didn´t reach the goal I had in mind, but who knows? :D
Either way it is a thing you can play and hopefully enjoy -^.^-
